scripts.compile:templates: mkdir -p public/js/templates && npm run compile:pages && npm run compile:partials
scripts.compile:pages: handlebars views/layouts/*.handlebars views/pages/*.handlebars views/pages/vac/*.handlebars views/pages/profile/*.handlebars views/pages/resume/*.handlebars  views/pages/polls/*.handlebars -f public/js/templates/templates.precompiled.js -c handlebars
scripts.compile:partials: handlebars views/partials/components/setting_inputes/*.handlebars views/partials/header/*.handlebars views/partials/resume/*.handlebars views/partials/*.handlebars views/partials/components/*.handlebars views/partials/profile/*.handlebars views/partials/vac/*.handlebars -p -f public/js/templates/partials.precompiled.js -c handlebars
